bug.author: trsvchn
bug.summary: [DOCS] Rendered class and method signature overlaps with [source] after sphinx update
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug description</denchmark-h>
I've noticed that after updating to sphinx=3.1, documentation has some problem with class header layout, if you go to the docs webpage, you can find that in some cases type hits overlap with [SOURCE] button, in some cases even definition overlaps as well. Zooming-in/out doesn't help. Here is what I get: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30748114/95250758-35894c00-0823-11eb-9cb1-cfc463e64afb.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30748114/95250768-391cd300-0823-11eb-8a8e-b20e8ad44885.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30748114/95250941-7da86e80-0823-11eb-84a0-b6cdadee6205.png></denchmark-link>
After roll back to old version everything works fine, Also, I've noticed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/0da6730f029863b3c812e05ddb3cec8a316c7c1c/docs/requirements.txt#L1>pytorch repo</denchmark-link> that they're using , I've tried that version and it works well too. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
sphinx==3.1
